interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Plant Therapy Himalayan Pink Salt. Fine Grain, Rich in Nutrients and Minerals To Improve Your Health. 1 pound (454 grams).
Review Date: 2016/01/24
Store: Plant Therapy
Product Description: ['Our All Natural Pink Himalayan Salt is perfect for body care products as well as for cooking. It tastes great and is full of minerals including magnesium, calcium, potassium, and iron, which makes it great for your skin too! Well known for its amazing health benefits, our All Natural Pink Himalayan Salt is the highest quality, food grade, Himalayan Salt available! Whether you use it in cooking to season meats and veggies or used in soups, or you use it in your DIY body care products, our Himalayan Salt is the perfect choice!']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.25 x 4 x 8 inches; 14.39 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912016056', 'Manufacturer': 'Plant Therapy Inc'}
Review Text: I like that this salt contains additional minerals and other nutrients I need. About ten years ago, I stopped using salt at the table. Because of a family history of hypertension, I wanted to start lowering my sodium intake, and just start a few healthier eating habits, in general. I used to sit at the table and sprinkle salt on my food before I'd even tasted it, and I just thought it was a terribly unhealthy habit and that it was time for a change. I'm not sure of all its health benefits of this pink Himalayan salt, or how significant they are, but I like the flavor. The kid in me loves the pretty pink color, and while I know, rationally, that it has no bearing on the flavor, I can't help but enjoy the way it looks in the shaker, with its grains of different shades. I tasted a bit upon opening the bag. To me, it doesn't have as strong a salty taste as regular table salt does, and it dissipates more rapidly on the tongue. In use with cooking, I also feel it's not as salty as my normal variety. It does a great job of allowing my other spices to do the work, and the seasoning blends I use can be better appreciated. I've also found that if I accidentally get a bit heavy-handed with this salt, it's more forgiving, since it's not as salty. Overall, I'm enjoying the way it looks and tastes, and my next experiment will be making my own body scrub. I was able to purchase this Himalayan pink salt at a discounted rate in exchange for my evaluation and unbiased review.
Review Title: A tasty alternative to table salt...
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
b.m.c by Bundle Monster 20pc Nail Art Image Manicure Stamping Plates-CYO 2 Collection
HealthMarket
['Bundle Monster 20pc Nail Art Image Manicure Stamping Plates-2014 CYO Collection']
{'Product Dimensions': '2.2 x 2.2 x 0.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '701233192271', 'Manufacturer': 'HealthMarket'}
Amazing images that stamp very well. My only complaint and the reason for taking off a star is that some of the images are too small for longer nails. I'm not yet good enough at stamping to "stretch" the images yet, but I plan to learn.
Etched well, but I wish images were larger.

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Interests**: The user maintains a strong interest in nail art and manicure supplies, particularly in products that enhance stamping techniques. Recently, they have expanded their interests to include health and wellness products, particularly natural alternatives that contribute to overall well-being.

- **Preferences**: The user favors products that are effective and yield clear results, with an emphasis on quality and usability. They appreciate items that provide aesthetic appeal and serve multiple purposes, such as both culinary and body care applications.

- **Experience Level**: Continues to identify as an intermediate skill level in nail stamping, with aspirations for improvement. The willingness to learn and experiment with various techniques remains evident, now extending to DIY body care products.

- **Feedback Style**: Offers constructive criticism; appreciates well-made items but is clear about areas for enhancement, showcasing a detail-oriented approach. Their reviews reflect a thoughtful evaluation of both practical functionality and sensory experiences.

- **Consumer Behavior**: Likely to engage with versatile, high-quality products that enhance usability and support healthier lifestyle choices. The recent purchase suggests an openness to exploring new areas for improvement in personal health and wellness, blending their interests in beauty and health.

Overall, the user continues to seek high-quality tools and products that accommodate both beginner and advanced techniques, with a newfound openness to wellness-focused alternatives.
